languages.text: Личная гвардия блюстителей почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана была лучше обучена и могла десантироваться в джунгли на абордажных челноках, однако их участие в боевых действиях было чревато потерями в экипаже корабля.

traits.locale_text: Личная гвардия блюстителей почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана была лучше обучена и могла десантироваться в джунгли на абордажных челноках, однако их участие в боевых действиях было чревато потерями в экипаже корабля.

languages.text: The Lord Captain's personal enforcer guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.
languages.original_text: Личная гвардия блюстителей почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана была лучше обучена и могла десантироваться в джунгли на абордажных челноках, однако их участие в боевых действиях было чревато потерями в экипаже корабля.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's personal guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.
The Lord Captain's personal guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.
The Lord Captain's personal guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.

The Lord Captain's personal enforcer guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの直属親衛隊はよく訓練されており、搭乗したシャトルでジャングルに着陸した。しかし船の乗組員を戦闘活動に配備するということは、彼らを失う危険を伴っていた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's personal enforcer guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの直属親衛隊はよく訓練されており、搭乗したシャトルでジャングルに着陸した。しかし船の乗組員を戦闘活動に配備するということは、彼らを失う危険を伴っていた。

languages.text: 舰长大人的私人镇压卫队训练有素，可以熟练地乘坐穿梭机在丛林中登陆。不过，若是在战斗中部署这支部队，可能会导致船员在战斗中减员。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's personal enforcer guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人的私人镇压卫队训练有素，可以熟练地乘坐穿梭机在丛林中登陆。不过，若是在战斗中部署这支部队，可能会导致船员在战斗中减员。

languages.text: La guardia personal {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} estaba mejor entrenada y capacitada para desplegarse en plena jungla desde naves de desembarco, aunque hacerlo en una operación de combate entrañaba el riesgo de sufrir bajas entre la tripulación.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's personal enforcer guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.

traits.locale_text: La guardia personal {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} estaba mejor entrenada y capacitada para desplegarse en plena jungla desde naves de desembarco, aunque hacerlo en una operación de combate entrañaba el riesgo de sufrir bajas entre la tripulación.

languages.text: Die persönliche Enforcer-Garde des Lord Captain war besser ausgebildet und in der Lage, Shuttles im Dschungel zu landen, aber ihr Einsatz in Kampfoperationen barg das Risiko von Verlusten für die Crew des Schiffs.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's personal enforcer guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.

traits.locale_text: Die persönliche Enforcer-Garde des Lord Captain war besser ausgebildet und in der Lage, Shuttles im Dschungel zu landen, aber ihr Einsatz in Kampfoperationen barg das Risiko von Verlusten für die Crew des Schiffs.

languages.text: Les prévôts personnels {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} étaient mieux entraînés et capables d'atterrir dans la jungle via des navettes, mais leur déploiement au combat comportait le risque de perdre des membres de l'équipage du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's personal enforcer guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.

traits.locale_text: Les prévôts personnels {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} étaient mieux entraînés et capables d'atterrir dans la jungle via des navettes, mais leur déploiement au combat comportait le risque de perdre des membres de l'équipage du vaisseau.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın şahsi infazcı muhafızı, daha iyi bir eğitime ve mekikleri ormana indirebilme kabiliyetine sahipti. Yine de çatışma operasyonlarının gemide mürettebat kaybına yol açma riski mevcudiyetini koruyordu.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's personal enforcer guard was better trained and capable of landing in the jungle on boarding shuttles, although deploying it in combat operations posed the risk of losses to the ship's crew.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın şahsi infazcı muhafızı, daha iyi bir eğitime ve mekikleri ormana indirebilme kabiliyetine sahipti. Yine de çatışma operasyonlarının gemide mürettebat kaybına yol açma riski mevcudiyetini koruyordu.
